verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord of all creation. Of water earth and sky The heavens are Your tabernacle. Glory to the Lord on high.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God of wonders beyond our galaxy You are holy, holy. The Universe declares Your majesty You are holy, holy. Lord of heaven and earth Lord of heaven and earth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Early in the morning I will celebrate the light When I stumble in the darkness I will call Your name by night{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah, to the Lord of heaven and earth (3x){/lang-eng}
